'''''The Tolkien Reader''''' is a [[1966]] paperback anthology of works by [[J.R.R. Tolkien]], published only in the United States, by [[Ballantine Books]].

==Contents==
*Publisher's Note
*Tolkien's Magic Ring, by [[Peter S. Beagle]]
*[[The Homecoming of Beorhtnoth|The Homecoming of Beorhtnoth Beorhthelm's Son]]
*[[Ofermod]]
*''[[Tree and Leaf]]''
**[[On Fairy-Stories]]
**[[Leaf by Niggle]]
*[[Farmer Giles of Ham]]
*[[The Adventures of Tom Bombadil]]

*''[[Tales from the Perilous Realm]]''
